Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Vase in the shape of a deep cup with a flat circular base. There are obvious throwing marks on the interior surface of the body and on the bottom of the vessel. It is pierced by a small hole. This cup covered a group of objects found in one of the foundation deposits of the temple at Sai
